001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jmxconnector;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
004
005import javax.management.remote.JMXAuthenticator;
006import javax.management.remote.JMXPrincipal;
007import javax.security.auth.Subject;
008import java.security.Principal;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.Set;
012
013public record ConfigJmxAuthenticator(List<JmxConnectorConfiguration.User> users,
014                                     Secrets secrets) implements JMXAuthenticator {
015    @Override
016    public Subject authenticate(Object credentials) {
017
018        if (credentials == null) throw new SecurityException("Incorrect username or password");
019        String[] usernamePassword = (String[]) credentials;
020        if (usernamePassword.length != 2) throw new SecurityException("Incorrect username or password");
021        String username = usernamePassword[0];
022        String password = usernamePassword[1];
023
024        for (JmxConnectorConfiguration.User user : users) {
025
026            if (username.equals(user.getUsername()) && password.equals(secrets.getSecretString(user.getPassword()))) {
027                Set<? extends Principal> principals = Set.of(new JMXPrincipal(usernamePassword[0]));
028                return new Subject(true, principals, Collections.emptySet(), Set.of(usernamePassword[1]));
029            }
030        }
031
032        throw new SecurityException("Incorrect username or password");
033    }
034}
